message:
Dear {{doc.applicant_name}}

Your Job application for {{doc.job_title}} has been accepted. Please note the interview date and details as scheduled below.

1. Interview date: {{frappe.utils.get_datetime(doc.interview_date).strftime('%d-%m-%Y')}}

2. Interview time: {{doc.interview_time}}

Please confirm receipt and your attendance.


Regards

HR Team
name: Job Applicant- Accepted
subject: Job Application Accepted {{ doc.name}}

message:
Dear {{doc.applicant_name}},

This is regarding your job application for {{doc.designation}} . We are sorry to inform you that at this time, we will not be able consider your application for the post. We will revert back when a suitable position is available.


Thanks and Regards

HR Team
name: Job Applicant Rejected
subject: Job Application rejected for {{doc.designation}} post

message:
Dear {{doc.applicant_name}},

Congratulations! We are pleased to inform you that you have been selected as {{doc.designation}}.

{% for row in doc.offer_terms %}

{{row.offer_term}}:{{row.value}}

{% endfor %}

Please join the company on {{doc.offer_date}}.


Thanks and Regards

HR Team
